sources.title: Face The Edge (1990) Powder panic! When the lodge locks down, truths avalanche out
sources.description:
When the powder stops falling, the truth starts snowballing! ‚ùÑÔ∏è Strangers trapped by a blizzard spill more than just hot cocoa...
Doctor Jane (Ashley Laurence), pro skier Nick (Russell Todd), and cop Tom (Craig Branham) find themselves snowbound at a remote lodge where cabin fever unlocks explosive personal revelations. As the storm rages outside, buried secrets surface faster than fresh powder.

Original Title: Face the Edge (1990) | AKA: One Last Run

‚≠êÔ∏è STARRING
Russell Todd (Nick)
Ashley Laurence (Jane)
Craig Branham (Tom)
Jimmy Aleck (Joe)
Tracy Scoggins (Cindy)
Chuck Connors (Buddy)

üé¨ CREW CREDITS
Directed & Written by Glenn Gebhard & Peter Winograd (Ski Patrol, Powder Burn)
Cinematography by Franz Weber (Alpine Dreams, Vertical Limit)
Ski Choreography by Warren Miller Entertainment (Legendary snow sports pioneers!)

üéØ WHY WATCH?
90s SLOPE SENSATION: Frostbitten drama meets vintage ski culture!
Ashley Laurence (Hellraiser) trading demons for downhill thrills!
Authentic Warren Miller-style action sequences that'll give you chills!
Rare gem where the lodge drama rivals the mountain mayhem! üèîÔ∏è

metadata.Plot: Stranded by a snowstorm, a doctor, a professional skier, and a policeman meet at a ski lodge to discuss their lives until the present.
metadata.Actors: Russell Todd, Ashley Laurence, Craig Branham
